entry.title: $2700 // No Fee -- Lux Building -- Balcony -- City Views! -- 5 mins to N/W Subw
entry.content:
No Fee -- Lux Building -- Balcony -- City Views! -- 5 mins to N/W Subway!

Listing ID #: 169631
Price: $2,700
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Approx. Size: 650 Sq. Ft.
Pets: No Pets

Building Amenities

Elevator

Apartment Amenities

Balcony
Dishwasher
Eat In Kitchen
Granite Kitchen
Hardwood
High Ceilings
Laundry In Unit
Light
NO FEE
Outdoor Space
Washer

Luxury unit with its own private balcony and city views located 5 minutes from the Astoria Blvd subway station! This unit had hardwood flooring throughout,floor to ceiling glass windows, and lots of natural light. Open concept kitchen has lots of cooking space, cabinets and comes equipped with stainless steel appliances. Additional amenities include laundry in building, furnished roof top and a fitness center at no additional cost! Heat, hot water and cooking gas included in rent. Tenant only pays for electricity.

Contact Shahnoor for a private viewing today! Cell: 347-853-2805 Email: shahnoor@BouklisGroup.com [email protected]
